text: "Trapped" is a 1972 song by reggae singer Jimmy Cliff and was made popular by Bruce Springsteen in the 1980s. ==Bruce Springsteen version== While on tour with The River in Spring 1981, Springsteen purchased a cassette tape of Cliff's single in the Netherlands and turned in from reggae to rock single. It did not appear on any of his studio albums. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Jimmy Cliff songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Trapped (Jimmy Cliff song)
